item.title: 银行和私人信贷争夺博士伦 50 亿美元融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，银行和私人信贷公司正在争相提供至少 50 亿美元的债务融资，以帮助为博士伦的潜在收购提供资金。【原文：Banks and private credit firms are competing to provide at least $5 billion of debt financing to help fund a potential buyout of Bausch + Lomb, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 沃尔玛支持的金融科技公司 PhonePe 营业收入猛增 74
item.description: 由零售巨头沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc.【原文：India’s PhonePe, a digital-payments startup that is backed by retail giant Walmart Inc., said its revenue surged and its loss narrowed in its latest fiscal year.】

item.title: 随着产量的增长，CNRL 占据了中石油在跨山公司的位置
item.description: 加拿大自然资源有限公司（Canadian Natural Resources Ltd.）以 65 亿美元的价格从雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）手中收购资产后，将在扩建后的跨山管道上占据更多空间，从而增强向市场输送原油的能力。【原文：Canadian Natural Resources Ltd. is taking over more space on the expanded Trans Mountain pipeline, bulking up its ability to ship crude to markets after buying assets from Chevron Corp. in a $6.5 billion deal.】

item.title: 大西洋联盟同意以 16 亿美元收购 Sandy Spring
item.description: Atlantic Union Bankshares Corp. 同意以约 16 亿美元的股票价格收购竞争对手 Sandy Spring Bancorp，中小型银行之间的整合正在加速。【原文：Atlantic Union Bankshares Corp. agreed to buy rival Sandy Spring Bancorp for about $1.6 billion in stock, as consolidation picks up among small and midsize banks.】

item.title: 市政债券基础设施销售额接近 2,500 亿美元，刷新纪录
item.description: 路易斯安那州查尔斯湖（Lake Charles）的一座新桥、费城儿童医院（Children's Hospital of Philadelphia）的一座 26 层楼高的病人塔楼以及得克萨斯州石油之乡中心地带的两所高中只是市政债券销售额有望创下历史新高的少数几个融资项目。【原文：A new bridge in Lake Charles, Louisiana, a 26-story patient tower for the Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia and two high schools in the heart of Texas’ oil country are just a handful of projects financed by what’s poised to be a record year of municipal bond sales.】

item.title: 北约成员国土耳其为何希望加入金砖国家？
item.description: 从 20 世纪 40 年代开始，对莫斯科心存戒备的土耳其将自己定位为美国的盟友，并在不久后加入了北约，北约是冷战期间为保护欧洲免受苏联进攻而成立的军事联盟。自 2003 年上台以来，雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安总统逐渐将土耳其重塑为一个独立的大国，即使惹恼了老朋友，也可以自由结交新朋友。在过去的十年中，由于对美国的不信任，土耳其一直在向美国的一些对手--中国、俄罗斯和伊朗--示好。【原文：Starting in the 1940s, Turkey, wary of Moscow, positioned itself as an ally of the US and soon after joined NATO, the military alliance founded to protect Europe against Soviet attack during the Cold War. Since coming to power in 2003, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan has gradually reinvented Turkey as a power in its own right that’s free to make new friends even if it upsets the old ones. In the past decade, it’s been courting a number of US adversaries — China, Russia and Iran — as distrust of W】

item.title: 加拿大养老基金准备以 70 亿欧元出售 Cubico 公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，加拿大安大略省教师养老金计划（Ontario Teachers' Pension Plan）和 PSP 投资公司即将启动对可再生能源公司 Cubico Sustainable Investments 的出售。【原文：Canada’s Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan and PSP Investments are about to kick off the sale of renewable energy company Cubico Sustainable Investments, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Hemlock 将为密歇根芯片工厂赢得 3.25 亿美元的美国拨款
item.description: Hemlock Semiconductor LLC 公司有望获得 3.25 亿美元的美国政府拨款，用于支持其密歇根工厂的扩建，公司计划在该工厂增加一种关键芯片制造材料的生产。【原文：Hemlock Semiconductor LLC is in line to win $325 million in US government grants to support an expansion of its Michigan facility, where the company plans to increase manufacturing of a critical chipmaking material.】

item.title: 以色列与伊朗：他们的冲突如何塑造中东
item.description: 几十年来，以色列和伊朗之间的冲突一直影响着中东地区。在肆虐该地区的众多冲突中，他们的冲突一直是最具爆炸性的冲突之一。双方相互攻击，大多数时候都是悄无声息地进行，而伊朗往往是通过代理人进行攻击，同时避免升级为直接战争。【原文：The low-boil conflict between Israel and Iran has shaped the Middle East for decades. Of the many conflicts that have roiled the region, theirs has long been among the most explosive. The two have attacked each other — mostly quietly and in Iran’s case often by proxy — while avoiding an escalation into direct war.】

item.title: 阿布扎比数十亿美元投入私人信贷热潮
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources.】

item.title: 宝洁公司在创下 10 年销售记录后重返市场
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，汰渍洗衣粉和佳洁士牙膏的制造商宝洁公司计划于周一出售公司债券。【原文：Procter & Gamble Co., the maker of Tide laundry detergent and Crest toothpaste, is planning to sell corporate bonds on Monday, according to a person with knowledge of the offering.】

item.title: 亚马逊和联邦快递竞争加剧，UPS 获得罕见卖出呼吁
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）在本周晚些时候发布第三季度财报前对这家航运巨头的收益表示担忧，联合包裹服务公司（United Parcel Service Inc.【原文：United Parcel Service Inc. received a rare sell recommendation as Barclays expressed concern on the shipping giant’s earnings ahead of third-quarter results later this week.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉在最新一次政府清洗中逮捕了前石油部长
item.description: 上周末，委内瑞拉拘留了前石油部长佩德罗-特莱切亚（Pedro Tellechea），这是在尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统有争议的连任之后对国家石油公司进行内部清洗的一部分。【原文：Venezuela detained former Oil Minister Pedro Tellechea over the weekend as part of an internal purge at the state oil company after President Nicolás Maduro’s disputed reelection.】

item.title: 阿波罗的斯洛克认为美联储 11 月维持利率的可能性上升
item.description: 阿波罗管理公司（Apollo Management）首席经济学家托斯滕-斯洛克（Torsten Slok）认为，随着美国经济的强劲增长，美联储官员在 11 月份维持利率不变的可能性正在增加。【原文：The chances that Federal Reserve officials will leave interest rates unchanged in November are mounting as the US economy powers ahead, according to Torsten Slok, chief economist at Apollo Management.】

item.title: 法国在长期计划中力争到 2029 年将赤字占国内生产总值的比例降至 2.8
item.description: 法国政府向议会提交了一份长期计划，以在未来几年内控制其失控的赤字，因为该国正努力恢复投资者的信心，并避免受到欧盟新财政规则的制裁。【原文：The French government submitted a long-term plan to parliament to rein in its runaway deficit in the coming years as the country seeks to restore investor confidence and avoid sanctions under the European Union’s new fiscal rules.】

item.title: 总统撤回税收法案后多米尼加共和国债券暴跌
item.description: 路易斯-阿比纳代尔总统撤回了一项旨在增加税收的法案，多米尼加共和国的债券随之下跌，打击了该国被提升为投资级的希望。【原文：Dominican Republic’s bonds fell after President Luis Abinader withdrew a bill that aimed to increase tax collection, dampening hopes the nation will be upgraded to investment grade.】

item.title: 比利时在明年禁令生效前恢复俄罗斯液化天然气的输送
item.description: 比利时在经历了夏季的冷清之后，正在恢复转运运往亚洲的俄罗斯液化天然气；这种做法已经使用了多年，但在 2025 年禁令出台之前却变得更具争议性。【原文：Belgium is resuming transshipments of Russian liquefied natural gas destined for Asia after a summer lull — a practice that’s been used for years but has become more controversial ahead of a 2025 ban.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚对从中国进口的廉价钢材加征关税
item.description: 哥伦比亚成为最新一个对中国钢铁提高关税的拉美国家，因为生产商抱怨廉价进口钢铁威胁到当地就业。【原文：Colombia became the latest Latin American country to raise tariffs on Chinese steel, as producers complain of the threat to local jobs from cheap imports.】

item.title: 据说泰晤士河水务公司将启动新股融资程序
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Utilities Ltd）已正式启动融资程序，以筹集至少 33 亿英镑（约合 43 亿美元）的资金来维持公司的运营。【原文：Thames Water Utilities Ltd has officially started a process to raise at least £3.3 billion ($4.3 billion) in equity that it needs to stay afloat.】

item.title: 海夫纳资本出价 1 亿美元入股收购花花公子品牌
item.description: 据知情人士透露，休-海夫纳（Hugh Hefner）的儿子库珀（Cooper）领导的海夫纳资本有限责任公司（Hefner Capital LLC）已表示有意从 PLBY 集团公司收购花花公子品牌。【原文：Hefner Capital LLC, a firm led by Hugh Hefner’s son Cooper, has expressed interest in acquiring the Playboy brand from PLBY Group Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行预计印度节日需求将有助于恢复增长
item.description: 印度央行表示，节日期间需求的复苏和消费者信心的提高将提振该国正在放缓的经济，但同时警告说，中东地区的地缘政治紧张局势可能会威胁到经济前景。【原文：India’s central bank said the country’s slowing economy will get a boost from a revival in demand during the festivals and improving consumer confidence, but warned that geopolitical tensions in the Middle East may threaten prospects.】

item.title: 纽伯格以 145 亿美元的价值支持北安格利亚连锁学校
item.description: 包括资产管理公司 Neuberger Berman 在内的一个财团正在收购 Nord Anglia 的股份，包括债务在内，该国际学校运营商的估值为 145 亿美元。【原文：A consortium including asset manager Neuberger Berman is buying a stake in Nord Anglia in a deal valuing the international school operator at $14.5 billion including debt.】

item.title: 象牙海岸债券可能缩小与南非评级的差距
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Bank）的一位策略师表示，在S&P Global上调了象牙海岸的信用评级后，象牙海岸成为撒哈拉以南非洲地区评级最高的主权国家之一，与博茨瓦纳和毛里求斯齐名，这使其债券与南非的额外利差有了缩小的空间。【原文：Ivory Coast became one of sub-Saharan Africa’s top-rated sovereigns alongside Botswana and Mauritius after S&P Global raised its credit rating, giving its bonds room to narrow their extra spread over South Africa, according to a Standard Chartered Bank strategist.】

item.title: 阿曼 OQ 公司在完成 20 亿美元交易几天后将再次进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿曼国有能源公司 OQ SAOC 最快将于本月底启动其甲醇和液化石油气部门的首次公开募股。【原文：Oman’s state energy company OQ SAOC is set to kick off the initial public offering of its methanol and liquefied petroleum gas unit as soon as the end of this month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国正取代欧洲成为俄罗斯管道天然气的最大市场
item.description: 在克里姆林宫对乌克兰的战争限制了流向该地区的天然气之后，中国今年有望成为俄罗斯最大的管道天然气市场，超过欧洲。【原文：China is on track to become the largest market for Russia’s pipeline gas this year, overtaking Europe after the Kremlin’s war against Ukraine capped flows of the fuel to the region.】

item.title: 人工智能软件初创公司 Zip 获得 22 亿美元新融资
item.description: ZipHQ 公司是一家为企业开发人工智能软件的初创公司，该公司以 22 亿美元的估值从投资者手中融资 1.9 亿美元。【原文：ZipHQ Inc., a startup developing AI software for businesses, has raised $190 million from investors at a $2.2 billion valuation.】

item.title: 壳牌称新加坡水域泄漏多达 40 吨泔水
item.description: 壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）今天在一份声明中说，陆上输油管泄漏已导致约 30-40 公吨 "泔水"（一种油和水的混合物）泄漏到新加坡附近海域。【原文：A land-based pipeline leak has led to about 30-40 metric tons of “slop” — a mixture of oil and water — being spilled into the sea off Singapore, Shell Plc said in a statement today.】

item.title: 尼日利亚批准将埃克森公司的陆上资产出售给 Seplat 公司
item.description: 尼日利亚批准埃克森美孚公司将其石油和天然气资产出售给国内能源供应商 Seplat Energy Plc，结束了这项价值 13 亿美元的交易长达两年多的停滞期。【原文：Nigeria approved Exxon Mobil Corp.’s sale of its oil and gas assets to domestic energy supplier Seplat Energy Plc, ending a more than two-year hiatus that stalled the conclusion of the $1.3 billion transaction.】

item.title: 奢侈品市场回暖，香港豪宅以 6000 万美元成交
item.description: 香港一栋豪宅以 4.7 亿港元（约合 6000 万美元）的价格售出，这再次表明较低的利率和新的政府措施正在帮助亚洲金融中心重振豪宅市场。【原文：A mansion in Hong Kong sold for HK$470 million ($60 million), in another sign that lower interest rates and new government measures are helping revive the luxury housing market in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 中国推进回收利用有可能拖累金属需求
item.description:
虽然该行业寄希望于最近的经济刺激计划来推动其发展，但重新利用商品的努力可能会产生更大的影响。【原文：

While the industry is banking on a recent stimulus blitz to give it a boost, efforts to reuse commodities might prove more consequential.

】
